Text.Page: You are deeply saddened to break the sad news to Kaia.
To honor the heroic deaths of Hasmina and Hellen, you returned to Allemantheia and attended the memorial service.

It's heartbreaking.

The personalities that once shone like Arborea's stars are gradually disappearing.

Manahan is the cause of the pain and confusion that is spreading through Arborea. So many heroes have lost their lives for this!

My sword, I know you're suffering too on account of the constant setbacks.

But you mustn't give up.

You must shoulder this burden for the benefit of Arborea.
Let's go to Allemantheia. After reporting to Fraya, we should say a prayer for Hasmina and Hellen.

How can this be?

Hellen and Hasmina are... because of Dakuryon...

The sisters have served Arborea diligently.

I will organize a memorial service to honor their actions.

Their achievements will be immortalized on the tombstone.

You run your fingers gently over the tombstone.

You remember the good times and the bad, and her bravery when she charged towards enemies with her twin swords.

Hasmina's strength and willingness to fight for her comrades will live long in the memory.

Hellen and Hasmina... Who could have imagined losing them in this senseless way.

We have been fighting Arborea's dangers for a long time, and we have lost many key figures along the way.

And we may lose more in the future too.

It could be me or another trusty comrade.

But we must never give in.

Our mission is to keep the peace in Arborea, and we must do so at all costs.
